batchEvaluateStreams().details: Keeper function - efficiently evaluates all proposals

evaluateProposalStream(uint256).details: Called by keeper or automatically after support changes

returns.meets: Array of booleans indicating if threshold is met

arbitrableConfigs(uint256).notice: Mapping of arbitrable config version to ArbitrableConfig

batchEvaluateStreams().notice: Batch evaluate all active funding proposals

cloneNonce().notice: Nonce for creating unique clone addresses - Slot 108

collateralVault().notice: Collateral vault for storing proposal collateral

currentArbitrableConfigVersion().notice: Current version of arbitrable configuration - Slot 111

cvParams().notice: Conviction Voting parameters (decay, weight, maxRatio, minThresholdPoints)

cvVault().notice: Yield distribution vault used as voting power registry

disputeIdToProposalId(uint256).notice: Mapping of dispute ID to proposal ID

evaluateProposalStream(uint256).notice: Evaluate single proposal and adjust stream based on threshold

getThresholdStatus().notice: Get threshold status for all active funding proposals

meetsThreshold(uint256).notice: Check if proposal currently meets threshold

pointConfig().notice: Configuration for point system (e.g., max amount for Capped)

pointSystem().notice: Voting power calculation system (Unlimited, Fixed, Capped, Quadratic) - Slot 119

proposalType().notice: Type of proposals (Funding or Signaling) - Slot 118

proposals(uint256).notice: Mapping of proposal ID to Proposal struct

registryCommunity().notice: Reference to the Registry Community contract

streamingEnabled().notice: Whether Superfluid streaming is enabled for this pool

superfluidToken().notice: Superfluid super token address for streaming payments

totalPointsActivated().notice: Total voting power activated in this strategy - Slot 113

totalStaked().notice: Total points staked across all proposals - Slot 112

totalVoterStakePct(address).notice: Mapping of voter address to total staked percentage

voterStakedProposals(address,uint256).notice: Mapping of voter address to array of proposal IDs they've staked on

ydsStrategy().notice: Yield Donating Strategy for Octant-style yield distribution

documentation.text:
@notice Batch evaluate all active funding proposals
 @dev Keeper function - efficiently evaluates all proposals

@notice Start funding stream with calculated units
 @param proposalId Proposal to start streaming to

@title CVStreamingFundingFacet
 @notice Threshold-based streaming for funding proposals
 @dev For ProposalType.Funding and ProposalType.Streaming pools
 
 Flow:
 1. Proposal created with requestedAmount
 2. Members allocate support  conviction accumulates
 3. When conviction >= threshold  stream starts
 4. When conviction < threshold  stream stops
 5. Can restart if conviction rises again
 
 vs Yield Distribution:
 - Yield: Proportional streaming (no threshold)
 - Funding: Binary on/off based on threshold crossing
